name: Sapphire
description:
Lighten up the mood for any occasion!
 Notes of mandarin orange, melon, and bergamot give you freshness that stays all day and the heart notes of jasmine, rose and lily will make your afternoon cozy. Your evening will brighten up with base notes from Musk and Cedarwood.

name: Crush
description:
Crush your bad mood with a positive spritz.
 Don’t let negativity crush your soul. top notes of Citrusy Bergamot give out a fresh sensation and heart notes of lavender calm the mood. Playful Vanilla evens it out.
top_note: Mandarin orange, Melon, Bergamot, Peach, Mongolia – gives out fruity scents
heart_note: Jasmine, Rose, Lily, Orchid, Plum-adds a dash of floral essence
base_note: Musk, Cedarwood – Settles the fragrance throughout the day

name: Amber Fox
description:
Scents that match your power!
 With powerful top notes of ginger & Maninka fruit, you will be the show’s stopper. Amber fox’s fragrance presents your dominance and authority with its woodsy heart notes of Iris. With a deeply masculine leather base, this fragrance is warm and inviting. Make every swoon with base notes of leather accords.

name: Island Mist
description:
Get lost in the midst of tropical scents!
 Travel to the exotic island of fruity notes of lemon, pear, and blackcurrant, and discover the heart of the island with the flowery fragrance of peony and jasmine. In the end, the woodsy fragrance of cedar forest awaits you. Enjoy the ocean scents with Island Mist.
top_note: Lime, Lemon, Bergamot, Pear, Black current & Mandarin Orange

name: Uncensored
description:
Enjoy the boundless life!
 Take time to relax and enjoy life with the top notes of Musk & Vodka, Hold on to your innocence with Peony & Osmanthus, and with cinnamon, Amber, let go of your fiery spirit. The future is in your hand so your destiny, live your life Uncensored.

name: Aqua Wave
description:
Surf on the waves of fresh fragrance!
Experience the freshness of beach waves with initial Bergamot and minty notes. Feel the masculine energy of Cypress and Cedarwood with hints of Patchouli and sandalwood in the base. Remember the good old days, you spent with your buddies at the beach on Summer days.

name: Fling
description:
A fragrance that turns heads!
 Make an entrance with a burst of fruity notes of Melon, Lemon, and Pineapple. Get on the stage with the floral hearts of Lotus, Lily, Rose, and Honey. In the end, let the magic happen with the woody scent of Vetiver, Sandalwood, and Musk.  Turn everyone’s attention towards you with Fling.
top_note: Lime, Lemon, Bergamot, Pear, Black current & Mandarin Orange

name: Cool Breeze
description:
The breeze brings old memories!
 With Earthy notes of the tea and Bergamot, get lost in the memories of youth. Youth is wild, like the heart notes of cardamom, pepper & coriander. Evoke the feelings that are long hidden like the notes of Cedar & Tonka Beans.
top_note: Tea, Bergamot, Lavender, Nutmeg flower, Orange Blossom, Mandarin Orange
base_note: Musk, Vetiver, Cedar, Oakmoss, Tonka Beans

name: Cool Mist
description:
Get lost in the midst of freshness!
 With spicy top notes of Ginger, Mandarin Orange, Pepper, and Bergamot take a tour in the morning. The heart notes of beautiful Violet, Flowers, and Vodka will give you a morning boost. Freshen your mood with base notes of Cedarwood and Vetiver.

name: Cool Musk
description:
Be enchanting from the very first moment!
 With floral top notes of peach blossom, lemon, and strawberry, make a good first move. The heart notes of beautiful lily rose, geranium, and jasmine will give you a spotlight. Leave your first impression the best with white musk,tonka beans, and moss.

name: Cool Wave
description:
Sing sea shanty loudly!
 Lead fantastic adventures of life with a minty cool scent with notes of Sea Water and Rosemary. Find the treasure of flowery notes Neroli and Jasmine with hidden hints of Oakmoss, Musk & Sandalwood. Life is an adventure, experience every moment like Cool Wave.
top_note: Mint, Green Nuances, Lavender, Coriander, Rosemary
